data.actual_result: Discord crashes and I get "Looks like Discord has crashed unexpectedly".
data.expected_result: I should be able to make a server Invite code or have the popup appear to invite someone to the server.
data.short_description: Pressing "Invite People" in a server crashes Discord.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server.- Press the arrow button on the top left next to the Server name. - Press "Invite People" in the menu that comes down.
